description: Miles finds himself at the mercy of top cop Eric Moreno in Scene Five. As Miles recounts his day his stress level rises to dangerous levels, prompting the sympathetic officer to offer him a soothing neck rub. It looks like Miles' day is about to get a lot better when Moreno strips in front of him, showing off his chiseled, slightly hairy body and gigantic bulge which keeps getting bigger as he grinds it into Miles' face. Miles pulls Moreno's fat uncut cock out of his boxers and gets it hard and wet so he can get the kind of rear end collision he's been needing all day. Officer Moreno takes public service to a new level when he puts his gun holster back on, throws Miles on the desk and fucks him long, hard and deep. The action gets intense until eventually both men shoot and collapse from exhaustion.
title: Rear-Ended, Scene #05
